[@microsoft/fast-element/di.js](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [Factory](../fast-element.factory/index.html)

## Factory interface

Used by the default Resolver to create instances of objects when needed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Factory<T extends Constructable = any> 
```

## Properties

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[Type](../fast-element.factory.type/)


</td><td>

`readonly`


</td><td>

T


</td><td>

The concrete type this factory creates.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

<table><thead><tr><th>

Method


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[construct(container, dynamicDependencies)](../fast-element.factory.construct/)


</td><td>

Constructs an instance of the factory's object.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[constructAsync(container, dynamicDependencies)](../fast-element.factory.constructasync/)


</td><td>

Constructs an instance of the factory's object, allowing for async resolution of dependencies.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[registerTransformer(transformer)](../fast-element.factory.registertransformer/)


</td><td>

Registers a transformer function to alter the object after instantiation but before returning the final constructed instance.


</td></tr>
